overview: Shelley's son is all grown up and her cheating husband doesn't pay her much attention. What is a beautiful mom in the suburbs to do? Escort, of course. When Shelley's client turns out to be the new guy in her husband’s office, all bets are off. Will her son find out – more importantly will her husband discover her secret? Starring the ever enticing Dana DeArmond as the Mom, blonde and sexy Zoey Monroe as the secretary, and exotic Ava Dalush as the other escort, with Evan Stone, Marcus London, Seth Gamble and guest appearances by “new to the scene” Lilly Banks and Chad Alva.
title: The Escort 3
